text:
@Mike_Pence No credibility. You said a return of Covid-19 would not happen. America is setting new and deadly records.

YOU ARE A LIAR.

Americans are horribly worse off than they were four years ago, and we know it.

139,076+ American Deaths

3,634,807+ American Infections https://t.co/3T7UDtuJGx
